title: Fact Check: Here’s the truth behind this picture of PM Modi’s mother | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Following the foundation stone laying ceremony of Ram Mandir in Ayodhya, a picture has surfaced on the internet in which PM Modi’s mother Heeraben can be seen sitting with folded hands in front of a television screen with a bold text in Hindi on it.

ALSO READ: This video of vehicles wading through potholes on flooded…

NewsMobile fact checked the above picture and found it to be FAKE.

On putting the picture through Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture.

In the original picture, it can be seen that PM Modi’s mother was looking at the visuals from Ayodhya when PM Modi visited Ram Lalla Virajman ahead of the foundation stone laying ceremony of Ram Mandir on August 5, 2020.

In the above FAKE vs REAL collage, it is clear that the original picture was manipulated using photo editing software.

In conclusion, the above information proves that the picture in question is FAKE.
